title: Supramolecular cage-mediated cargo transport
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS01081C, Tutorial Review
Qing-Hui Ling, Zhen-Chen Lou, Lei Zhang, Tongxia Jin, Wei-Tao Dou, Hai-Bo Yang, Lin Xu
This review comprehensively summarizes the development of supramolecular cages as carriers and channels for cargo transport in abiotic and biological systems.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
